web_snippets: Boston-based conductor, singer, and music educator, Sarah Labrie, is a Choral Director at Lexington High School in Lexington, MA.
Sarah LaBrie is a librettist and writer. Her work in The Industry's opera Hopscotch was featured in The New Yorker as well as The New York Times, LA Times, and ...
Bio. Sarah LaBrie is the author of No One Gets to Fall Apart: A Memoir which was a New York Times Editor's Pick and Notable Book of 2024.
